titles.title: David L. Corbett Lighthouse Transfer Act
To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey the lighthouse located at Ontonagon, Michigan, to the Ontonagon County Historical Society, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/8/2000--Introduced. David L. Corbett Lighthouse Transfer Act - Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Ontonagon County Historical Society a parcel of land underlying and immediately surrounding the lighthouse at Ontonagon, Michigan. Makes the Secretary responsible for all environmental remediation of such land.
